about: Hello, I'm Josh Genereux, a junior software developer with 1.5 years of experience primarily focused on front-end development. I'm passionate about creating engaging user experiences, optimizing web performance, and crafting beautiful interfaces. While I specialize in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I also have a keen interest in back-end development. I'm eager to expand my knowledge and contribute to all aspects of web development. My journey in software development has been an exciting learning experience, and I'm enthusiastic about exploring new challenges and technologies. Let's connect and share our passion for coding and technology!
